IntroSection.name: Nhat Thang
IntroSection.short_intro: I enjoy building things for the web3.

AboutSection.desc: During my undergraduate studies at Hanoi University of Science and Technology, I developed a solid foundation in software engineering, with a growing passion for decentralized applications and blockchain-based solutions. In my third year, I began focusing on modern front-end frameworks and smart contract integration, diving deep into technologies like Web3.js and Next.js. My curiosity led me to build full-stack dApps that combined Solidity smart contracts with scalable, user-friendly interfaces. Through internships and freelance projects, I contributed to DeFi dashboards, NFT marketplaces, and DAO tooling platforms. These real-world challenges sharpened my technical and problem-solving skills while solidifying my career direction. I'm proficient in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and TailwindCSS, and have hands-on experience with Foundry, Hardhat, and IPFS. In my spare time, I enjoy experimenting with on-chain logic, writing about Web3 trends, and sharing coding insights. Outside of tech, I stay balanced through cooking, working out, and exploring new music and films üç≤üí™üé¨.
